Translation: A birch tree is growing on that place

Primary_Text: колхозницаэз да челядь мунiсö ыб вылö
IPA: kolhozɲit͡sɑez da t͡ɕeʎɑɟ munisɘ ɨb vɨlɘ
Analyzed: kolhozɲit͡sɑ-ez da t͡ɕeʎɑɟ mun-isɘ ɨb vɨlɘ
Translation: kolkhoz women and children went to the field
I'm writing a letter to my brother
He was called to a meeting

IPA: nijɑ kin tɑlun giʒisɘ otʎit͡ɕno vɨlɘ
Analyzed: nijɑ kin tɑlun giʒ-isɘ otʎit͡ɕno vɨlɘ
Gloss: those who today write-PST.3PL excellent PP
Translation: Those who wrote a perfect score today...

Primary_Text: Мийö бура тöдам, что бур кöдзысöн кöдзан – бур лоас и сю
IPA: Mijɘ burɑ tɘdɑm ʃto bur kɘd͡ʑɨsɘn kɘd͡ʑɑn bur loɑs i ɕu
Analyzed: Mijɘ bur-ɑ tɘd-ɑm ʃto bur kɘd͡ʑɨs-ɘn kɘd͡ʑ-ɑn bur lo-ɑs i ɕu
Gloss: 1PL good-DER know-PRS.1PL that good seeds-INSTR sow-FUT.2SG good will.be-FUT.3SG PTCL grain
Translation: We know well that if you sow good seeds, the grain will also be good
The fields were covered with rank green plantlet
The women went early to mow
Before studying in school, Vanya lived in the village
On my way from school, I peeped into a library

Primary_Text: Кöр быдöс советскöй школьниккез пондöтасö виль велöтчан год…
IPA: kɘr bɨdɘs sovetskɘj ʃkoʎɲikkez pondɘtɑsɘ viʎ velɘtt͡ɕɑn god
Analyzed: kɘr bɨdɘs sovetskɘj ʃkoʎɲik-k-ez pondɘt-ɑsɘ viʎ velɘtt͡ɕɑn god
Gloss: when all soviet schoolchild-PL start-FUT.3PL learn-PTCP year
Translation: When all Soviet schoolchildren start the new school year...

Primary_Text: Дак этö тэ йылiсь меным часöт висьталiсö?
IPA: dɑk etɘ te jɨliɕ menɨm t͡ɕɑsɘt viɕtɑlisɘ?
Analyzed: dɑk etɘ te jɨliɕ menɨm t͡ɕɑsɘt viɕtɑl-isɘ?
Gloss: so that you about 1SG.DAT now tell-PST.3PL
Translation: So you're the one they just told me about?

Primary_Text: Эта пуыс мöдiк пуэс сьöртi ёнжык
IPA: etɑ puɨs mɘdik pues ɕɘrti jonʒɨk
Analyzed: etɑ pu-ɨs mɘdik pu-es ɕɘrti jon-ʒɨk
Gloss: this tree-POSS.3SG other tree-PL as strong-CMPR
Translation: This tree is stronger than other trees
A cow is bigger than a sheep

Primary_Text: … медбы нiя вермисö быдсö асьнысö да ассиныс кужöмсö мыччавны
IPA: medbɨ nijɑ vermisɘ bɨdsɘn ɑɕnɨsɘ dɑ ɑsɕinɨs kuʒɘmsɘ mɨt͡t͡ɕɑvnɨ
Analyzed: medbɨ nijɑ verm-isɘ bɨdsɘn ɑɕ-nɨsɘ dɑ ɑs-ɕinɨs kuʒ-ɘm-sɘ mɨt͡t͡ɕɑv-nɨ
Gloss: so.that they can-PST.3PL fully self-ACC.POSS.3PL and own-ABL.POSS.3PL be.able-NMLZ-ACC.POSS.3SG show
Translation: …so that they could show themselves and their skills

Primary_Text: Ыджыт погодаöн пöрöтöм пуэз тыртiсö вöр туйсö
IPA: ɨd͡ʒɨt pogodɑɘn pɘrɘtɘm puez tɨrtisɘ vɘr tujsɘ
Analyzed: ɨd͡ʒɨt pogodɑ-ɘn pɘrɘt-ɘm pu-ez tɨrt-isɘ vɘr tuj-sɘ
Gloss: strong wind-INS fell.down-PTCP tree-PL fill-PST.3PL forest road-ACC.POSS.3SG
Translation: Trees felled by strong wind blocked a forest road
Don't shed your tears in vain
Now it's a place for young people to learn

Primary_Text: Кöр мийö локтiм кöр дынö, сiя вöлi кулöма ни
IPA: kɘr mijɘ loktim kɘr dɨnɘ, sijɑ vɘl kulɘmɑ ɲi
Analyzed: kɘr mijɘ lokt-im kɘr dɨnɘ, sijɑ vɘl-i kul-ɘmɑ ɲi
Gloss: when 1PL come-PST.1PL deer to it be-PST.3SG dead-PTCP already
Translation: When we came to the deer, it was already dead
